abstract: Stocks end largely flat following day of broad early losses as investors respond to corporate earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Procter & Gamble and Facebook fell after disappointing earnings, but a government report showed the economy rebounded in the second quarter.

headline.main: Market Drifts as Investors Get Good News, and News Not So Good
headline.print_headline: Market Ends the Day Flat, Shaking Off Early Losses

snippet: Shares of Procter & Gamble and Facebook fell after disappointing earnings, but a government report showed the economy rebounded in the second quarter.
